DataElement.preferredName: DNA Damage Response Deficiency Gene Alteration Status
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The status of a DNA damage response deficiency gene alteration at a particular time.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: DNA Damage Response Deficiency Gene Alteration
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A decrease in the ability of cells to respond to damaged DNA and to repair the damage. This DNA repair deficiency can be caused by mutations in the genes involved in the DNA damage response and/or DNA repair._A functional unit of heredity which occupies a specific position on a particular chromosome and serves as the template for a product that contributes to a phenotype or a biological function._The act or process of modifying something.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A decrease in the ability of cells to respond to damaged DNA and to repair the damage. This DNA repair deficiency can be caused by mutations in the genes involved in the DNA damage response and/or DNA repair.

Concepts.definition: A decrease in the ability of cells to respond to damaged DNA and to repair the damage. This DNA repair deficiency can be caused by mutations in the genes involved in the DNA damage response and/or DNA repair.

The act or process of modifying something.
